CatDescriptText: Howard Jones, 66 Sylvania Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 12, 1958, pg. 1A with question: �Do you think that the Pittsburgh Railways Company is justified in asking an increase in trolley fares?� answer reads: �No, because I think that it�s just too much money to pay.�
